mapper.select: /* cstm.getCstmList 고객 리스트 조회 */ SELECT B.BUYER_ID , B.BUYER_NM , B.TEL , B.ADDR , B.COMPANY_REGNUM , B.HOW_GET , GET_CODE_NM( 'HOW_GET', B.HOW_GET ) HOW_GET_NM FROM TBL_EXP_BUYER B WHERE 1=1 AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY B.BUYER_NM
mapper.update: /* cstm.updateCstm 고객 저장 */ MERGE INTO TBL_EXP_BUYER T USING ( SELECT #{BUYER_ID} AS BUYER_ID, #{BUYER_NM} AS BUYER_NM, #{TEL} AS TEL, #{ADDR} AS ADDR, #{COMPANY_REGNUM} AS COMPANY_REGNUM, 'XXX' AA HOW_GET, #{USE_YN} AS USE_YN, #{DEL_YN} AS DEL_YN FROM dual ) S ON (T.BUYER_ID = S.BUYER_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.BUYER_NM = S.BUYER_NM, T.TEL = S.TEL, T.ADDR = S.ADDR, T.COMPANY_REGNUM = S.COMPANY_REGNUM, T.HOW_GET = S.HOW_GET, T.USE_YN = S.USE_YN, T.DEL_YN = S.DEL_YN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( BUYER_ID, BUYER_NM, TEL, ADDR, COMPANY_REGNUM, HOW_GET, USE_YN, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( S.BUYER_ID, S.BUYER_NM, S.TEL, S.ADDR, S.COMPANY_REGNUM, S.HOW_GET, S.USE_YN, S.DEL_YN )
mapper.delete: /* cstm.deleteCstm 고객 삭제 */ UPDATE TBL_EXP_BUYER SET USE_YN = 'N' , DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE BUYER_ID = #{BUYER_ID}
